name: The Revenge of Imhotep (Ludum Dare 32)
description:
IMHOTEP and his goons want to end the world! The only way to stop them is by killing them with a SUPER-SOAKER full of HOLY WATER.

PRESS [F4] TO GO FULLSCREEN

WASD to move

Left Mouse Button to spray holy water (if you have it)

The .exe file is what you want.

The .gmk is the source and can be opened with Gamemaker8.0

This game was made by sawyerWeld for Ludum Dare 32 and is my first Ludum Dare entry. Thank you for playing!
